entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
